function.name: washing_setCourse
function.description: This function is used to set a specific washing course on a washing machine.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the washing course.

mode.description: The mode to set for the washing course.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to set the washing course.
